name: Ultimate Possession!
description:
After a decade of trying to lead a normal life, third-year college student Koki Maekawa gets entangled with the brash ghost Liana's unfinished business.

Her wish? For her fiancé to find love once again. Unfortunately for him, Meadow, the junior Koki has a crush on, has her eyes set on the infamous fiancé. 

With a ghost who refuses to leave his side and his own crush developing a liking for somebody else, what is a young man to do but reluctantly rely on his abilities as a medium?

A Phantasia Jam 2022 submission, «Ultimate Possession!» is a +16 ongoing fantasy romance comedy about a reluctant medium and the ghost haunting him.

Follow Koki and Liana's unconventional partnership as he tries to fulfil his insufferable companion's final wish. Will he allow the blooming romance between his crush and her fiancé to continue? Or will he be stuck with Liana for the rest of his living days?

The following story contains...

  • mentions of suicide
  • mature language

More to come...

  • An annoyed male protagonist
  • An exuberant female ghost haunting him 24/7
  • Choose how Koki reacts to his surroundings, will he remain calm through this ordeal or blow more than a fuse on the way?
  • Choose whether to show empathy or remain aloof
  • Play matchmaker or meddle in the burgeoning love story between the Crush and the Fiancé, or nudge the latter in a different direction altogether
  • Unlockable Achievements
  • Multiple Endings

    • Koki Maekawa "The Medium" [21, He/Him]

    A pessimist third-year college student trying his best to lead a normal life despite inheriting the ability to see and interact with ghosts. For over ten years, he tried his best to avoid getting involved in ghostly affairs, deeming them troublesome, until he had the unfortunate luck of meeting Liana.

    Liana "The Ghost" [25, She/Her]

    An exuberant ghost with unfinished business in the human realm. She was engaged to her best friend since birth, for whom she never developed any romantic interest. Her greatest wish is for him to finally experience being loved back and move on from her death.

    Meadow Hino "The Crush" [20, She/Her]

    The sweet, down-to-earth and kind junior. She works part-time at a coffee shop close to Flavian’s flat. Through this job, she develops a crush on the melancholic man. She considers Koki a dependable, albeit a tad eccentric, upper classman.

    Flavian Lydon McCoy "The Fiancé" [26, He/Him]

    Liana’s grieving fiancé and best friend. He was in love with Liana since childhood. Following her death, he has sworn off falling in love with anyone, spending all his time buried in work and visiting her grave.
